channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: I used the Munbyn AceScan AS01 to track my studio kit, and it’s the easiest scanner I’ve tested
item.description: Designed to keep track of your inventory, this Android 14-powered barcode scanner enables fast inventory identification with a feature-packed, rugged design. An interchangeable battery and doubling as a standard smartphone all add to its flexibility, whether you need to keep track of stock on a small or large scale.

item.title: Nuclear startups are back in vogue with small reactors, and big challenges
item.description: Small modular reactor startups are betting that mass manufacturing will help them bring costs down. But are they underestimating the challenge?

item.title: Amazon's New Year's sale is slashing prices on Apple devices — AirPods, iPads, and smartwatches from $99
item.description: Amazon's New Year's sale has incredible deals on Apple's best-selling devices, including AirPods, iPads, smartwatches, and MacBooks, starting at $99.99.

item.title: Instagram says accounts 'are secure' after wave of suspicious password reset requests
item.description: If you received a bunch of password reset requests from Instagram recently, you're not alone. Malwarebytes, an antivirus software company, initially reported that there was a data breach revealing the "sensitive information" of 17.5 million Instagram users. Malwarebytes added that the leak included Instagram usernames, physical addresses, phone numbers, email addresses and more. However, Instagram said there was no breach and that user accounts were "secure." We fixed an issue that let an external party request password reset emails for some people. There was no breach of our systems and your ...

item.title: The Honeywell Home X2S Smart Thermostat is smart heating made simple
item.description: The X2S Smart Thermostat is an easy-to-use Energy Star certified thermostat. It’s not the most modern-looking device, but it does the job.

item.title: Barcelona vs Real Madrid Free Streams: How to Watch Spanish Super Cup Final 2026 From Anywhere in the World
item.description: All the ways to watch Barcelona vs Real Madrid live streams online and from anywhere, as the two bitter rivals compete in the Spanish Super Cup final.

item.title: ‘Star Wars’ Fans Haven’t Given Up on Ben Solo’s Cinematic Return
item.description: Disney quietly canceled a Ben Solo movie, but the character's fans are trying to loudly make a case for why it should happen.

item.title: Google’s AI Inbox could be a glimpse of Gmail’s future
item.description: This week, Google announced a new AI Inbox view for Gmail that replaces the traditional list of emails with an AI-generated list of to-dos and topics to track based on what's in your inbox. It's not widely available yet, but I have access, and in the few hours I've spent messing around with it, I […]

item.title: Indonesia and Malaysia block Grok over non-consensual, sexualized deepfakes
item.description: Indonesian officials said Saturday that they are temporarily blocking access to xAI’s chatbot Grok.

item.title: On a testé le casque vélo phare de Decathlon pendant 1 an : visionnaire mais sans bonne visière
item.description: Astucieux avec un évent et une visière rétractables, le casque vélo Decathlon 900 est pratique sous la pluie et par temps froid, moins sous la chaleur. Il souffre aussi de quelques défauts, que nous mettons en exergue dans ce test complet.

item.title: Wing’s drone delivery is coming to 150 more Walmarts
item.description: Wing is bringing drone delivery to even more Walmart stores in 2026. The Alphabet-owned company announced today that its drones will be flying above 150 more locations this year, including in four new cities: Los Angeles, St. Louis, Miami, and Cincinnati. In June 2025, the companies said they would expand their delivery partnership to 100 […]

item.title: Wing to expand drone delivery to another 150 Walmart stores
item.description: The partnership will grow Wing's drone delivery service to more than 270 Walmart stores by 2027.

item.title: Google announces a new protocol to facilitate commerce using AI agents
item.description: Google said that merchants can now offer discounts to users directly in AI mode results

item.title: The Sony Inzone E9 in-ear gaming headphones are a good choice if you want to buy a pair of earbuds almost exclusively for FPS games
item.description: The Sony Inzone E9 in-ear gaming headphones are a good pick for hardcore FPS gamers thanks to their detailed directional sound, but are poorly suited for anyone else with flat bass and a high asking price.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Monday, January 12 (game #1449)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Monday, January 12 (game #946)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Monday, January 12 (game #680)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: Ce puissant laptop avec écran OLED et Ryzen AI 5 est à un prix plus attractif grâce à cette offre des soldes
item.description: L'Acer Aspire 16 est un laptop qui tend à répondre à toutes vos envies que ce soit pour de la création ou simplement du divertissement. À l'occasion des soldes d'hiver, il bénéficie d'une double remise sur le site de Darty dont une grâce à une offre de remboursement de 100 euros et il tombe à 649,99 euros.
